src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Hello I I 'd really like I 'm hungry I 'd really like to eat . And is the room air-conditioned ? The restaurant ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . Of course . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] [MASK] LP : So , Mrs companion , do you know what I 'll be eating today ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : Oh but no , I do n't know , I 'm going to ask . [MASK] RC : Can you tell us if there is a cafeteria ? We 've been very well received here , and I have no directions . I 'm looking for a cafeteria to have a coffee or a hot chocolate . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Can you tell me where on the ground floor ? Right , left , straight ahead ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Okay , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Um also ... [MASK] LP : Um what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] RC : Can you tell me the cafeteria opening hours ? So the lifts and the cafeteria are right next to each other ? ARI : Absolutely . # affirm ( ) RC : Oh , okay , thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around . Have a nice day . # bye ( )

[MASK] [MASK] RP : I 'm hungry . [MASK] [MASK] LC : I 'd like to eat . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : It 's the most important question of the day . Are you hungry yet ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Yes . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You can ask my colleague in the room who is responsible for the meals . [MASK] [MASK] LC : I 'd like to go to the toilet before the consultation . [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . # inform ( directions ( toilet ) ) @ AG ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) )

src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : Um hello , okay , I think we need to find the rheumatology ward . # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( rheumatology_ward ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( rheumatology_ward ) ) RP : Yes , I think that 's it . Ok , we 'll see if he can give us any information . # affirm ( ) ; request ( help ) LC : Mhm . # acknowledge ( ) [start] RP : So do you want to ask him or do you want me to ? I 'll do it . RP : I 'd like to find the rheumatology ward . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Ok , he told us to go to the building behind us , it 's the second door on the left . He 's giving us directions . That 's handy . There you go . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] LC : What time was our appointment ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : So we have an appointment at 10.30 PM . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] [MASK] RP : It 's 10 PM just now so we have plenty of time . LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : We have time . LC : We 'll walk slowly . RP : We 'll walk slowly . LC : Yes . [MASK] RP : There 's no need to worry . RP : Ok , there you go , we 're in the ward . We need to ask where the reception for this ward is . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Well that 's it , we 've arrived . LC : Ok . Very good . [MASK] RP : Do you want to ask him ? [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] LC : Um ... Where is the reception for the rheumatology ward ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ah ... [MASK] [end] RP : Ok , thank you . # acknowledge ( ) ; thank ( ) @ CG ( LC+RP , go-to ( reception ) ) RP : So we 'll take a ticket . LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

[MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] [end] RC : Thank you , bye . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) LP : See you soon . You too , have a nice day . # bye ( )
